response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $140 for it. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic opportunity to acquire something truly exceptional at a price that is slightly above its cost to me but still below its perceived value to you. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 140}
